job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Do you want to make a huge impact on a large e-commerce website? Are you interested in solving groundbreaking research problems while impacting all eBay e-commerce channels? Does working with Artificial Intelligence, cloud computing, large-scale optimization, and large language models excite you? If this sounds like you, the Core AI team at eBay is the right place for you! We are looking for Machine Learning Engineers with a diverse set of backgrounds to join us., We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Machine Learning Engineer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in Natural Language Processing (NLP) and experience with Large Language Models (LLMs). You will be responsible for developing and implementing sophisticated deep learning models to further empowering our buyers and sellers. You will work closely with research scientists and multi-functional NLP and platform engineers to create new capabilities from initial algorithms and out to features in our products and services., * Design, develop, and deploy advanced machine learning algorithms, with a focus on NLP/LLM or multimodal interactions.
     * Work closely with cross-functional teams to integrate machine learning solutions into our products and platforms.
     * Conduct research on the latest technologies and methodologies in NLP and multimodal LLMs to drive innovation within the team.
     * Collaborate with data engineers and scientists to preprocess, clean, and structure large datasets for model training and evaluation.
     * Implement best practices in model development, validation, testing, and deployment to ensure high-quality and scalable solutions.
     * Stay abreast of industry trends and advancements in AI, machine learning, and NLP to continuously improve our capabilities.
job_details.full_text:
Machine Learning Engineer

Do you want to make a huge impact on a large e-commerce website? Are you interested in solving groundbreaking research problems while impacting all eBay e-commerce channels? Does working with Artificial Intelligence, cloud computing, large-scale optimization, and large language models excite you? If this sounds like you, the Core AI team at eBay is the right place for you! We are looking for Machine Learning Engineers with a diverse set of backgrounds to join us., We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Machine Learning Engineer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in Natural Language Processing (NLP) and experience with Large Language Models (LLMs). You will be responsible for developing and implementing sophisticated deep learning models to further empowering our buyers and sellers. You will work closely with research scientists and multi-functional NLP and platform engineers to create new capabilities from initial algorithms and out to features in our products and services., * Design, develop, and deploy advanced machine learning algorithms, with a focus on NLP/LLM or multimodal interactions.
     * Work closely with cross-functional teams to integrate machine learning solutions into our products and platforms.
     * Conduct research on the latest technologies and methodologies in NLP and multimodal LLMs to drive innovation within the team.
     * Collaborate with data engineers and scientists to preprocess, clean, and structure large datasets for model training and evaluation.
     * Implement best practices in model development, validation, testing, and deployment to ensure high-quality and scalable solutions.
     * Stay abreast of industry trends and advancements in AI, machine learning, and NLP to continuously improve our capabilities.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes working with Large Language Models (LLMs), Natural Language Processing (NLP), and multimodal interactions, aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer. While 'Machine Learning Engineer' is in the title, the specific tasks like 'design, develop, and deploy advanced machine learning algorithms, with a focus on NLP/LLM' and 'research on the latest technologies and methodologies in NLP and multimodal LLMs' point more towards generative AI applications than traditional predictive modeling.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'develop and implement sophisticated deep learning models' and 'Design, develop, and deploy advanced machine learning algorithms, with a focus on NLP/LLM or multimodal interactions' directly relate to the creation and adaptation of models.
job_tasks.phrase: develop and implement sophisticated deep learning models

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Design, develop, and deploy advanced machine learning algorithms, with a focus on NLP/LLM or multimodal interactions' describes the core modeling activities.
job_tasks.phrase: Design, develop, and deploy advanced machine learning algorithms, with a focus on NLP/LLM or multimodal interactions

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Work closely with cross-functional teams to integrate machine learning solutions into our products and platforms' indicates the need to embed ML models into user-facing systems.
job_tasks.phrase: integrate machine learning solutions into our products and platforms

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Conduct research on the latest technologies and methodologies in NLP and multimodal LLMs' points to exploring and adapting new modeling techniques, especially in generative AI.
job_tasks.phrase: Conduct research on the latest technologies and methodologies in NLP and multimodal LLMs

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Collaborate with data engineers and scientists to preprocess, clean, and structure large datasets for model training and evaluation' describes data preparation activities essential for modeling.
job_tasks.phrase: preprocess, clean, and structure large datasets for model training and evaluation

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Implement best practices in model development, validation, testing, and deployment to ensure high-quality and scalable solutions' covers the operational aspects of deploying and maintaining models.
job_tasks.phrase: Implement best practices in model development, validation, testing, and deployment

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Stay abreast of industry trends and advancements in AI, machine learning, and NLP to continuously improve our capabilities' highlights the need for continuous learning and adaptation.
job_tasks.phrase: Stay abreast of industry trends and advancements in AI, machine learning, and NLP

soft_skills.phrase: Stay abreast of industry trends and advancements in AI, machine learning, and NLP
